children.description: Defines the children. Use 'explicitList' for a fixed set of children, or 'template' to generate children from a data list.

template.description: A template for generating a dynamic list of children from a data model list. `componentId` is the component to use as a template, and `dataBinding` is the path to the map of components in the data model. Values in the map will define the list of children.

distribution.description: Defines the arrangement of children along the main axis (vertically). This corresponds to the CSS 'justify-content' property.

alignment.description: Defines the alignment of children along the cross axis (horizontally). This corresponds to the CSS 'align-items' property.
